<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="PAUSADO">   <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#e11919"/>   <rect x="8.2" y="7.6" width="2.8" height="8.8" rx="1.1" fill="white"/>   <rect x="13.0" y="7.6" width="2.8" height="8.8" rx="1.1" fill="white"/> </svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="HD">   <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#3b82f6"/>    <!-- Corpo do HD -->   <rect x="7.2" y="7.8" width="9.6" height="8.8" rx="1.6" fill="white"/>    <!-- “Disco” (platter) -->   <circle cx="12" cy="12.2" r="2.5" fill="#3b82f6"/>   <circle cx="12" cy="12.2" r="0.7" fill="white"/>    <!-- “Braço” -->   <path d="M13.7 10.8 L15.8 9.2"         stroke="#3b82f6" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round"/>    <!-- LED embaixo -->   <circle cx="15.8" cy="15.6" r="0.55" fill="#3b82f6"/> </svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="HD">   <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#3b82f6"/>    <!-- Corpo do HD -->   <rect x="7.2" y="7.8" width="9.6" height="8.8" rx="1.6" fill="white"/>    <!-- “Disco” (platter) -->   <circle cx="12" cy="12.2" r="2.5" fill="#3b82f6"/>   <circle cx="12" cy="12.2" r="0.7" fill="white"/>    <!-- “Braço” -->   <path d="M13.7 10.8 L15.8 9.2"         stroke="#3b82f6" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round"/>    <!-- LED embaixo -->   <circle cx="15.8" cy="15.6" r="0.55" fill="#3b82f6"/> </svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="DOCKER LAYERS">   <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#0ea5e9"/>    <!-- camadas -->   <path d="M7 10.2l5-2.6 5 2.6-5 2.6-5-2.6z" fill="white" opacity="0.95"/>   <path d="M7 12.6l5 2.6 5-2.6" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"         stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" opacity="0.95"/>   <path d="M7 15.0l5 2.6 5-2.6" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"         stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" opacity="0.95"/> </svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-label="DISCO">   <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10" fill="#3b82f6"/>   <!-- Drive -->   <rect x="7" y="8" width="10" height="8" rx="1.5" fill="white"/>   <!-- Slot -->   <rect x="8.5" y="10" width="7" height="1.3" rx="0.65" fill="#3b82f6"/>   <!-- LED -->   <circle cx="15.6" cy="14.1" r="0.8" fill="#3b82f6"/> </svg>

title: DOCKER
